pageContext.claim: “It's the first time [prescription drug companies have] ever done [rolled back price increases]. They rolled them back. And I thanked Pfizer, and I thanked Novartis, and I thanked all the other companies that did. They rolled them back.”
pageContext.analysis: Pfizer did agree to a brief pause but then announced it would raise prices on 41 prescription drugs as planned at the start of 2019. It did not roll back prices.
